body_html: I am not sure we should spend this much effort to separate the name of list slicing from normal slicing. In all other cases we use a single Symbol to correspond to a single syntactic operator in script, but here we are introducing a bunch of complexity just to undo that simplicity. If this all just for the sake of not using the aten namespace for a list op, I think it is not worth it.

body: I am not sure we should spend this much effort to separate the name of list slicing from normal slicing. In all other cases we use a single Symbol to correspond to a single syntactic operator in script, but here we are introducing a bunch of complexity just to _undo_ that simplicity. If this all just for the sake of not using the aten namespace for a list op, I think it is not worth it.
